member.name: T:NUClass.BTManager
member.summary: Handles the low-level connection to the IMU device through Bluetooth.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.client
member.summary: 32Feet library client to handle Bluetooth connection.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.port
member.summary: Port address used to handle Bluetooth connection.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.connection_details
member.summary: Debug report from connection attempt to the specified IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.stream
member.summary: Data stream acquired from the IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.bt_address
member.summary: 32Feet library representation of the IMU device's MAC address.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.end_point
member.summary: 32Feet library representation of the IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.packet_size
member.summary: Desired data packet size. [0:2] - start sequence, [3] - packet size, [4] - id, [5:22] - data, [23] - packet size.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.IMU_connection
member.summary: Parent IMUConnection instance.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.debug_connection_reports
member.summary: Boolean flagging whether to produces debug report for this IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.sequence_start
member.summary: Integers used to represent start of a new packet from the data stream.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.get_data
member.summary: Thread instance which handles the asynchronous streaming of IMU data.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.stream_open
member.summary: Whether the stream should currently being read.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.safe_to_terminate
member.summary: Whether the streaming thread can be safely aborted.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.attempt_number
member.summary: Current connection attempt being made.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.max_attempts
member.summary: Maximu connection attempts that can be made.

member.name: F:NUClass.BTManager.connection_info
member.summary: Whether or not to collect IMU firmware information.

member.name: P:NUClass.BTManager.initial_connection
member.summary: Is this the first attempt?

member.name: P:NUClass.BTManager.connection_established
member.summary: Has a connection been made to the Bluetooth end point?

member.name: P:NUClass.BTManager.stream_established
member.summary: Has a stream instance been pulled from the Bluetooth connection?

member.name: P:NUClass.BTManager.connection_live
member.summary: Have the appropriate bytes been collected from the stream instance?

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.#ctor(NUClass.IMUConnection,InTheHand.Net.BluetoothAddress,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs the class and assigns global variables from the passed parameters, then sets up basic connection variables.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.establish_bluetooth_connection
member.summary: Gets the port address and establishs the 32Feet end point for making a connection to the IMU device over Bluetooth.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.connect
member.summary: Attempts to connection over Bluetooth to the IMU device and establish a data stream from it. Provides several attempts at a connection and gets the IMU firmware number if required.
member.returns: T - Connection success, F - Connection failure.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.start_streaming
member.summary: Creates the thread to asynchronously handle the data stream and starts it.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.stream_data
member.summary: Function used to handle the data stream. Send the initiate command, waits for data to become available and then compiles the stream into correct data packets. Continues while 'stream_open' is true, throws a a disconnect event if no data read for two seconds.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.send_data(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes the passed byte to the IMU device.
member.param: Byte to send to IMU device.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.send_data(System.String)
member.summary: Send a string to the IMU device, breaking it down into the corresponding bytes.
member.param: String message to be converted into bytes.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.db_report(System.String)
member.summary: Console debugging output if toggled on.

member.name: M:NUClass.BTManager.establish_device_details(System.String)
member.summary: Acquires the Bluetooth version number being used to connect to the Bluetooth device.
member.param: Formatted string name of the IMU device.
member.returns: String representation of the Bluetooth version number.

member.name: T:NUClass.Calibration
member.summary: Handles the data storage when using the Madgwick algorithm as well as providing functionality for reading / writing configuration files.

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.calibrated
member.summary: Is the IMU device currently calibrated?

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.countdown
member.summary: variable used to keep track of the interations performed in the calibration stage.

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.axes
member.summary: Axes used for the magnetometer,accelerometer and gyroscope.

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.variables
member.summary: Master dictionary of the values stored from the IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.IMU_number
member.summary: Number associated with the IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.path
member.summary: Path to the calibration memory file.

member.name: F:NUClass.Calibration.IMU_connection
member.summary: Parent IMUConnection instance.

member.name: P:NUClass.Calibration.valid_config_file
member.summary: Whether the configuration file is valid.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.#ctor(System.String,NUClass.IMUConnection)
member.summary: Constructs the Calibration class, passing the associated IMU number and parent IMUConnection instance. Looks for the associated calibration file and attempts to read it if it exists, else creates a new one.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.get_variables_array
member.summary: Formats the master dictionary to a string array to be printed to the calibration file.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value from the master dictionary.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.set(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the value in the master dictionary associated with the passed keys.
member.param: Integer value to set in the master dictionary.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.adjust(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Increments the value in the master dictionary associated with the passed keys.
member.param: Integer value to increment the value in the master dictionary by.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.is_calibrated
member.summary: Is the IMU device calibrated?

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.set_calibrated(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the IMU device is calibrated.

member.name: M:NUClass.Calibration.populate_variables
member.summary: Builds the structure of the master dictionary.

member.name: T:NUClass.BluetoothDisconnect
member.summary: A delegate used to contain functions that occur when a bluetooth device disconnects from the tablet.

member.name: T:NUClass.ConnectionManager
member.summary: Main interface of the NUClass project - instantiates other classes and handles event calls from connected GarmentInterface instance. Provides high-level debug information relating to system configuration and compiles final output when an exercise is complete.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.IMU_COUNT
member.summary: Statically set amount of IMU devices to be connected.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.DEBUG
member.summary: Manualy set boolean for increased debugging output.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.USE_CALIBRATION
member.summary: Manually set boolean indicating whether or not to use an existing calibration file.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.END_REPETITION_STRING
member.summary: Include a repetition string on the end of the processed CSVs.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.repetition_count
member.summary: Amount of repetition events triggered whilst conducting the current exercise.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.disconnect_event
member.summary: Disconnect event for triggering interuption of main thread.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.IMU_connected
member.summary: Boolean array of whether IMU devices are currently connected.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.IMU_numbers
member.summary: Internal list of the unformatted IMU number read from the 'imunames.txt' file.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.IMU_locations
member.summary: List of the IMU locations on the garment. Corresponds with the order of the IMU_numbers.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.IMU_connections
member.summary: Mapping of IMU numbers to instance of IMUConnection.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.processed_rep_string
member.summary: Formatting string added to the processed CSV when a repetition event occurs.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.raw_rep_string
member.summary: Formatting string added to the raw CSV when a repetition event occurs

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.raw_data
member.summary: List of formatted strings detailing the IMU number and raw integer reads of the IMU devices ready to be written to the raw CSV output.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.processed_data
member.summary: List of formatted strings detailing the processed quaternions and MMG readings of the IMU devices ready to be written to the processed CSV output.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.file_location
member.summary: Location of the output directory passed from the GarmentInterface.

member.name: P:NUClass.ConnectionManager.device_information
member.summary: Report on the Bluetooth version and IMU firmware version of each IMU device connected, compiled at the end of each connect event.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.stream_start
member.summary: Time stamp of when the stream starts.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.stream_end
member.summary: Time stamp of when stream ends.

member.name: F:NUClass.ConnectionManager.repetitions
member.summary: List of the indices when repetion events occurred.

member.name: P:NUClass.ConnectionManager.debug_information
member.summary: Report on the connection configuration and attempts produced when making a connection attempt. Details where a connection attempt failed.

member.name: P:NUClass.ConnectionManager.unique_device_numbers
member.summary: Are the IMU numbers provided unique?

member.name: P:NUClass.ConnectionManager.valid_names_file
member.summary: Does the names file have to correct amount of entries?

member.name: P:NUClass.ConnectionManager.bluetooth_enabled
member.summary: Is Bluetooth enabled on this device?

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor establishes the IMU numbers from the 'imunames.txt' file before validating them. Checks whether Bluetooth is enabled. If Bluetooth is enabled and a valid list of IMU numbers is provided, begins connection attempts.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.set_IMU_names
member.summary: Attempts to read the 'imunames.txt' file, calls 'validate_names_file' and checks for unique entries.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.validate_names_file(System.String[])
member.summary: Checks IMU_numbers for the right amount of correctly formatted IMU numbers.
member.param: List of IMU numbers provided by 'imunames.txt'.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.check_bluetooth_enabled
member.summary: Is Bluetooth enabled on this device?

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.set_connections
member.summary: Populates the connections array with a new instance of IMUConnection for each IMU.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.compile_processed_entry(NUClass.Quaternion[],System.Single[])
member.summary: Takes the processed quaternions from all IMU devices and their corresponding MMG reads and formats them ready to be written to the processed CSV file.
member.param: Processed MMG data from each IMU.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.compile_raw_entry(System.Int32[][])
member.summary: Takes the raw data input from all IMU devices and formats them ready to be written to the raw CSV file.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.connection_event(NUClass.BluetoothDisconnect)
member.summary: Starts parallel threads for each IMU listed in IMU_numbers which attempt to establish a connection to the specified IMU. Updates local connection statuses and debug info.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.close_connections
member.summary: Loops the IMU connections and invokes the call to close the underlying connection.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.build_debug_report
member.summary: Called at the end of each connection event to compile the connection debug report from local variables as well as aggregating from each IMU connection.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.build_device_report
member.summary: Called at the end of each connection event to compile the high-level debug information on the system and its configuration.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.stream_data(System.String)
member.summary: Start streaming event. Removes old data and triggers streaming from each IMU connection. Timestamps the start of streaming.
member.param: The target directory for the processed and raw CSV.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.stream_toggle(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method invoked by the start and end streaming events to loop through the IMU connections and toggle their underlying data streams on or off.
member.param: Whether to open or close the data streams, T-open / F-close.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.clear_data
member.summary: Resets all the collections and values stored from the previous read when starting a new stream event.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.get_MMG_readings(System.Single[][])
member.summary: Takes the MMG readings from all connected IMUs and extracts the important reads.
member.param: Processed MMG reads from each IMU.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.end_event(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: End of exercise event invoked from the GarmentInterface. Pauses the IMU connection streams and determines the path for each file to be output before aggregating the IMU data, formatting it and then printing it to CSV files.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.aggregate_results
member.summary: Collects all the reads from each IMU connections and restuctures it into formatted strings which are appended to the raw and processed data lists. Also inserts the repetition event strings at the appropriate instances based on earlier recording of when they occurred.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.process_reads(System.Object[][],System.Int32)
member.summary: Breaks down the data from a data recording from each of the IMU devices.
member.param: All the data from all the IMUs.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.print_results(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Outputs a list of strings to the desired file path.
member.param: A list of strings to be written to a file.
Path as to where to output the file.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.repetition_event
member.summary: Event fired when calling a repetition from the GarmentInterface. Checks the current read count of each IMU device and makes a note of the latest index for the repetition event to occur at.

member.name: M:NUClass.ConnectionManager.disconnection(System.String)
member.summary: Invoke the 'disconnection_event' to interupt the main thread if one of the IMUs disconnects.
member.param: IMU number of the IMU device which has disconnected.

member.name: T:NUClass.IMUConnection
member.summary: Central class for each connected IMU devices. Creates and handles the low-level Bluetooth controller and manages memory relating to Bluetooth MAC address, IMU configuration files and input data reads. Houses the Madgwick algorithm and MMG manipulations to process raw data.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.IMU_number
member.summary: Unformatted IMU number associated with the connected IMU device.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.calibration
member.summary: Memory of and underlying functions relating to read / write of the configuration file.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.processed
member.summary: The processed quaternion produced from the latest raw data input.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.bt_manager
member.summary: The underlying instance of the Bluetooth manager class.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.connection_manager
member.summary: Parent ConnectionManager instance.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.IMU_memory
member.summary: Name of the text file which acts as a record of a previously connected IMU device's MAC address.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.step_size
member.summary: Scaling factor used when performing gradient descent in the Madgwick algorithm.

member.name: P:NUClass.IMUConnection.raw
member.summary: The raw data input from the last read from the IMU stream.

member.name: P:NUClass.IMUConnection.MMG
member.summary: The processed IMU data created from the last raw data input.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.debug_connection_reports
member.summary: Flag used to indicate whether or not extensive debugging is on.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.client
member.summary: Client instance managing Bluetooth connection and stream acquisition.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.MAC_address
member.summary: MAC address of the IMU device attempting to be connnected with.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.devices
member.summary: All devices discovered in Bluetooth range.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.IMU_device_name
member.summary: Formatted IMU string name built from its number.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.records
member.summary: A store of all the raw reads and processed data collected.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.use_calibration
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether to attempt to read existing calibration files or to create new ones.

member.name: F:NUClass.IMUConnection.connection_information
member.summary: Debug report collected from this IMU connection.

member.name: P:NUClass.IMUConnection.conn_info_set
member.summary: Has the IMU device data been collected?

member.name: P:NUClass.IMUConnection.device_found
member.summary: Has a corresponding device been found over Bluetooth? Will always flag false when using the MAC file.

member.name: P:NUClass.IMUConnection.MAC_file
member.summary: Was the connection attempt made using information from an existing record of the correspong MAC address?

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.#ctor(System.String,NUClass.ConnectionManager,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets global variables based on those passed as parameters, creates an instance of the Calibration class and determines the formatted IMU device name and the path to the memory file. Creates a new Bluetooth client and checks for a coressponding MAC file.
member.param: Whether to acquire device connection data.
Whether to use calibration file if it exists.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.Check_MAC_file(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to read MAC file at the path specified if it exists. If not present or the read fails, attempts to discover the device over the local Bluetooth.
member.param: Path to the IMU's MAC file.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.load_from_MAC_file(System.Char[])
member.summary: Reads in the chars array passed and converts it to a byte array before using this to create a Bluetooth address instance.
member.param: Character array read from the MAC text file.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.create_MAC_file
member.summary: Writes the MAC file for a device when discovered over Bluetooth saving the address for faster future connection attempts.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.check_for_device
member.summary: Checks the local Bluetooth devices searching for one with a corresponding name to the formatted IMU name.
member.returns: MAC address if found, null if not.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.connect
member.summary: Creates new record and Bluetooth manager classes before attempting to connect to the IMU device. If an instance of the Bluetooth manager is already in effect, will make a call to dispose of it first.
member.returns: Whether the connection attempt to the IMU device was successful.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.dispose_previous_connection
member.summary: Performs safe termination of the Bluetooth manager's underlying data stream thread, disposes of the associated 32Feet Bluetooth client and then the Bluetooth manager itself.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.set_connection_info(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the information from the Bluetooth and firmware versions to the connection information dictionary. Sets the fact that the data has been collected in the 'conn_info_set' boolean.
member.param: Major version number of the firmware.
Minor version number of the firmware.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.close
member.summary: Closes the Bluetooth connection by terminating the associated thread, sending a stop command to the IMU device and closing the underlying Bluetooth connection.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.data_read_event(System.Int32[],System.Int64)
member.summary: Method invoked by the underlying Bluetooth manager when a data packet is assembled from the stream. Triggers data processing and the addition of both raw and processed values to the records class.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.set_stream(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Toggles whether the Bluetooth manager should be streaming data.
member.param: Whether the stream should be open.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.process_data(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Takes the raw input data and invokes the appropriate method to handle its processing depending on whether the calibration phase is completed. Calls the MMG data processing.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.integrate_sensor_readings(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Integrates the high and low reads from the gyroscope, magnetometer and accelerometer into singular values.
member.param: High and low values from the IMU read.
member.returns: Integrated gyro, mageto and accel data.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.process_MMG(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Converts the high/low integer bands of the MMG reads into individual float values.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.short_ints(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Converts the integer raw data values into short values for more accurate processing.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.adjust(System.Int16[])
member.summary: Gets the memory / calibration of the IMU values after calibration is complete and invokes the main Madwick algorithm.
member.param: Short values converted from the raw integer values.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.calibrate(System.Int16[])
member.summary: Updates the values saved for the IMU device during the calibration phase. Begins to call the Madgwick algorithm once the threshold has been met.
member.param: Short values converted from the raw integer values.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.update(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Implementation of the Magdewick algorithm, using IMU data to update orientation Quaternion.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.get_debug_information
member.summary: Compiles the connection debug information from this class and the underlying Bluetooth connection manager instance.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.get_currrent_index
member.summary: Used to determine the current index within the records class when a repetition event occurs.

member.name: M:NUClass.IMUConnection.disconnection
member.summary: Disconnection event thrown by underlying Bluetooth manager, inform connection manager.

member.name: T:NUClass.Quaternion
member.summary: Internal representation of a quaternion instance.

member.summary: Quaternion W value.

member.name: F:NUClass.Quaternion.X
member.summary: Quaternion X value.

member.name: F:NUClass.Quaternion.Y
member.summary: Quaternion Y value.

member.name: F:NUClass.Quaternion.Z
member.summary: Quaternion Z value.

member.summary: Constructor which assigns the quaternion values.

member.name: M:NUClass.Quaternion.clone
member.summary: Creates a new quaternion with the same values as the original.

member.name: M:NUClass.Quaternion.stringify
member.summary: Outputs the quaternion in a manner ready to be included in the processed CSV file.

member.name: T:NUClass.Records
member.summary: Class recording all the raw, processed and MMG readings from an IMU connection.

member.name: F:NUClass.Records.records
member.summary: Underlying list to store data.

member.name: F:NUClass.Records.current_index
member.summary: Current index within the data list.

member.name: F:NUClass.Records.record_sum
member.summary: Total count of records stored.

member.name: F:NUClass.Records.IMU
member.summary: IMU number of the associated IMU device.

member.name: M:NUClass.Records.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs the class, assigning the passed IMU number.

member.name: M:NUClass.Records.add_record(System.Int64,System.Int32[],NUClass.Quaternion,System.Single[])
member.summary: Adds an entry as a collection of objects to the underlying records list.
member.param: Count in ticks from start of streaming until this read was made.
Integer array representation of the raw input.
Quaternion produced from the raw input.
Processed MMG data from the raw input.

member.name: M:NUClass.Records.get_record(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the objects at the specified index from the records list.
member.returns: Object array of raw,processed and MMG data.

member.name: M:NUClass.Records.flush
member.summary: Invoked on new exercise attempt, empties the records list and resets the positional variables.
